GSD.description:
scsi: myrs: Fix crash in error case

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.180 by commit 5c5ceea00c8c9df150708e66cb9f2891192c1162. For more details please see the references link.
